title: Steady States: Finding Balance in a Risky World
text:
Game of Life


Code
% set our global plot options: "light mode"
set(groot, 'defaultFigureColor', 'w');
set(groot, 'defaultAxesColor', 'w');
set(groot, 'defaultAxesXColor', [0.1 0.1 0.1]);
set(groot, 'defaultAxesYColor', [0.1 0.1 0.1]);
set(groot, 'defaultTextColor', 'k');
set(groot, 'defaultLegendTextColor', 'k');   % k == black
set(groot, 'defaultFigureInvertHardcopy', 'on');




Code
%%% Simulation Code %%%
%----------------------
clear

% Task: build 1000 monte carlo simulations

rng(14) % set seed
sims = 1000; % num of sims

% to create conways game of life, our universe is a matrix.
% the non-zero elements are the population

life = zeros(4); % initalize our 4x4 grid of zeros

rows = [1, 1, 2]; % set our agents
cols = [1, 2, 2];
idx = sub2ind(size(life), rows, cols);
life(idx) = 1;

% visualize our non-zero points (agents)
spy(life)
